name: CaloSense
description:
CaloSense is a comprehensive pre- and post-bariatric surgery program with two major value propositions:
Dramatically increase the conversion rate of potential patients to actual surgeries, resulting in more surgeries for clinics.
Improve long-term patient outcomes, addressing the 35% of patients who regain weight, and reducing costs for health insurance.
one_liner:
CaloSense is a comprehensive pre- and post-bariatric surgery program with two major value propositions:
Dramatically increase the conversion rate of potential patients to actual surgeries, resulting in more surgeries for clinics.
Improve long-term patient outcomes, addressing the 35% of patients who regain weight, and reducing costs for health insurance.
